Introduction
This topic contains information on the application of 38 CFR 3.107 on awards to parents, including
rights of a non-claiming parent in DIC cases
, and
rates of DIC payable to claiming parents
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Initial Authorization Issues
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
